title: Login Issue - Unable to Access Account
description: Customer reports being unable to log in despite using the correct credentials.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Checkout Button Not Working
description: User reports that the checkout button is unresponsive on mobile devices.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Customer suggests adding a dark mode option for better usability at night.

title: Refund Request - Duplicate Charge
description: Customer claims they were charged twice for the same order.

title: Slow Performance - Loading
description: Customer reports that the dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load.

title: Account Locked - Too Many Attempts
description: Customer's account is locked due to multiple failed login attempts.

title: Shipping Delay - Order Not Received
description: Customer has not received their order after 10 business days.

title: UI Issue - Text Overlapping
description: On smaller screens, text in the profile section overlaps with buttons.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Customer is unable to reset their password as the reset link is expired.
